overlay.base: fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4

modal.base: relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto transform transition-all duration-300

header.base: flex items-center justify-between p-6 border-b border-neutral-200
header.title: text-lg font-semibold text-neutral-900
header.subtitle: text-sm text-neutral-600 mt-1
header.closeButton: text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-600 transition-colors duration-200 p-1 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-100

footer.base: flex justify-end space-x-3 p-6 border-t border-neutral-200 bg-neutral-50

closeButton.base: absolute top-4 right-4 text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-600 transition-colors duration-200 p-1 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-100

form.input: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-neutral-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500
form.button: w-full bg-primary-600 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded-md hover:bg-primary-700 transition-colors duration-200 font-semibold
form.decline: w-full text-neutral-500 py-2 px-4 rounded-md hover:text-neutral-700 transition-colors duration-200 text-sm underline
